mapper.insert: insert into board ( title, content, nickname, address, area ) values ( #{title}, #{content}, #{nickname}, #{address}, #{area} )
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, nickname = #{nickname}, address = #{address}, area = #{area} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, title, nickname, address, area, content, created_at from board order by created_at desc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
